targets.query: SELECT integral("value") FROM "netdata.statsd_timer_swift.object_server.get.timing.events" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value") FROM "netdata.statsd_timer_swift.object_server.delete.timing.events" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "netdata.statsd_timer_swift.object_server.get.timing.events" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "netdata.statsd_timer_swift.object_server.delete.timing.events" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  FROM /netdata.disk.sd\w.reads/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM /netdata.disk_util.sd\w.utilization/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") *-1 FROM /netdata.disk_ops.sd\w.writes/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM /netdata.disk_ops.sd\w.read/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") *-1 FROM /netdata.disk.sd\w.writes/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "netdata.system.cpu.user" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostIs$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM /netdata.sensors.coretemp_isa_0000_temperature.Core_\w*/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($timeVariable) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "netdata.disk_space._.avail" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: host
list.name: host

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "netdata.disk_space._.avail" WITH KEY = "host"
